mapper.select: select userid,username,name,phone,sex from userinfo where FIND_IN_SET(userid,(select guanzhu from userinfo where username=#{username}))

select mi.microid,mi.microdata,mi.userid,mi.fileid,mi.zhuanfaid,mi.zanshu,mi.cangshu ,ui.username,ui.name,fi.filepath filepath from microinfo mi left join userinfo ui on mi.userid = ui.userid left join filetable fi on mi.fileid=fi.fileid order by mi.zanshu desc

select mi.microid,mi.microdata,mi.userid,mi.fileid,mi.zhuanfaid,mi.zanshu,mi.cangshu ,ui.username,ui.name,fi.filepath filepath from microinfo mi left join userinfo ui on mi.userid = ui.userid left join filetable fi on mi.fileid=fi.fileid where mi.userid=#{userid}

select mi.microid,mi.microdata,mi.userid,mi.fileid,mi.zhuanfaid,mi.zanshu,mi.cangshu ,ui.username,ui.name,fi.filepath filepath from microinfo mi left join userinfo ui on mi.userid = ui.userid left join filetable fi on mi.fileid=fi.fileid WHERE FIND_IN_SET(microid,(SELECT shoucangid from userinfo WHERE username=#{username}))
